step1.title: Welcome to Marketopia System
step1.full_description: Welcome to the Marketopia System! You can manage and view all your data.

step2.title: Step 2: System Settings
step2.full_description: Customize your Marketopia system according to your needs. You can adjust general settings, add users, and configure permissions.

step3.title: Step 3: Add Data
step3.full_description: Add your data to the Marketopia system. You can add products, users, transactions, and more.

step4.title: Step 4: View Data
step4.full_description: View your data in the Marketopia system. You can use analysis and reporting tools to better understand your data.
